backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping several homepage UI features to their source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and components for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables and light/dark color tokens, applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, font preconnects, and root div mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app registering routes and rendering them inside AppLayout with an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Responsive team-member row displaying an image with fallback icon and text content, supporting reversed layout.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number ticker using IntersectionObserver to start counting when visible.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Accordion-style service selector listing predefined services and updating selection on click with validation styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary displaying a styled fallback error card with reload button when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact details, social links, and smooth-scroll quick links that navigate or scroll based on current page.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Renders an About section with firm overview text, approach items, and a button navigating to the About page.
Displays an FAQ list with expandable items and injects structured FAQ schema JSON-LD.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Shows a final call‑to‑action section with a consultation button that navigates or scrolls to the contact area.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Provides a hero banner with text, an image, and a button that navigates to or scrolls to the contact page.
Implements a responsive navbar with scrolling and navigation behavior for sections and pages.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Renders a step‑based timeline explaining the legal process using cards and numbered markers.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Shows a looping marquee of partner cards with names and categories using a duplicated list for seamless scrolling.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders a partners section with a header and marquee displaying a static list of partner names and categories.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Displays a grid of legal services with icons and includes navigation handlers for exploring services and contacting the firm.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements a horizontally scrollable testimonials carousel with responsive cards and navigation controls.
Wraps a testimonials section containing a static list of testimonials and renders the carousel component.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows animated trust indicators using icons and a number ticker to highlight experience and achievements.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main layout with a navbar and smooth hash-based scrolling behavior on route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context handling login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Provides an animated number-ticking hook that increments smoothly when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes actor and fetch state using useActor as a placeholder for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, global CSS variables for light and dark themes, and common component/utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with firm values, team members, and feature sections, including navigation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a consultation form with validation, submission simulation, and UI sections for contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage by rendering multiple section components and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with an error message and button to navigate home.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions with icons and descriptions for use across the site.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders service offerings from servicesData in a grid layout with a CTA to contact the firm.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Defines a simple custom client-side router with route registration, navigation, and React hook integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking UI/UX update features, pending requests, and metadata for homepage hero, Our Approach, and How It Works sections.
